verses.text: Mamin Jehová, tik wal swal in b'a t'ayach.
Ach in Diosal, a achnhej tzach wak'och yipoc in k'ool. Manh in actejkan t'a skal niwac q'uixwelal. Manh in a cha yak' ganar heb' ajk'ool yajoch t'ayin yic max tzalaj heb' in stzetzani.
Vojtak wal to a masanil heb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool, manh ol q'uixwoquel-laj heb'. Ha heb' schichon sk'ol t'ayach t'a nab'anhej, q'uixwokab'el heb'.
Mamin Jehová, ch'ox a b'e t'ayin. D'a juntzanh a b'e chi' tzin ik' b'eyoc.
k'ayb'ej in t'a a lolonel te yel, yic wach' tzin b'ey t'a wach'il, yujto in Diosal ach, in Kolumal ach. Ha achnhej tzach wak'och yipoc in k'ool t'a masanil tiempo.
Mamin Jehová, nacot a chamk'olal yet' a wach'k'olal, jun toxonton ix ak' quila'.
Axo pax juntzanh in mul jun, manhxo a nacoti. Manhxookab' a nacot in chukal t'a yictax ix wak'an quelemal. Mamin, tzin a nacot yet' a niwan chamk'olal yet' a wach'k'olal.
Mamin Jehová, wach' ach toni, tojol ach toni. Yuj chi' tza tojolb'itej sb'eyb'al heb' sk'ulan chukal.
Tza ch'oxan pax heb' emnaquil t'a sb'eal tojolal, aton b'eyb'al tza nib'ej.
Yuj a wach'k'olal, yujto tza k'anab'ajej pax tas tzala', yuj chi' tza cuchb'ej heb' sk'anab'ajan a checnab'il icha syal a trato.
Mamin Jehová, te niwan in chukal. Ak' in niwank'olal icha wal ix utej alani.
Ha mach tzach k'anab'ajani, tza k'ayb'ej heb'. D'a jun b'e wach' tzik'b'at heb'.
Toxonton tzik'chaanh heb'. Ha heb' yuninal heb' ol ikankan lum lum tik.
Ha heb' ay elk'och t'a sat, aton heb' ay xivk'olal t'ayach, tzak' razón t'a heb', tzak'an pax elk'och a trato t'a heb'.
Mamin Jehová, anhej t'ayach ayoch in pensar. Ha ach ol in a colel t'a ch'anh yaal.
Mamin, ilincoti, ok'oc wal a k'ool t'ayin. Ina to in ch'ocojil, te ay in och t'a ilk'olal.
Ix te niwanb'i wilk'olal tik, colinel t'a in somk'olal.
Ilincot t'a in cusk'olal yet' t'a in yaelal, tzak'ankan niwank'olal in chukal.
Il tonab'i, manh jantacoc heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ste chichonoch sk'ol heb' t'ayin.
Tanhwej in, manh in a cha chamoc, manh in a chab'at t'a niwac q'uixwelal, yujto a t'ayach tzin col in b'a.
Comonoc tzin a colo', yujto wach' in b'eyb'al, malaj in mul. Ha ach ayachoch yipoc in k'ool.
Ach in Diosal, colonhcanel a onh israel onh tik t'a ko cusk'olal yuj masanil syaelal.
